Message:
After the Curse had
covered the entire continent,
we returned to that small village.

To the place where
my cute little fan was.

But...the Curse had
sent everything to ruin.

There wasn’t a single
moving body in sight.

Among the rubble...
is where I found it.

Its neck ripped off...
Its body...stained in blood.

Is...is there really nothing
I can do for them in
the circus?

What...what should we do...?
What should I do...?
